_description: Gospel for the Feast of the Assumption in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint luc þat holi monTelleþ vs here as he wel
                    con…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þat kyng þat gracius isBring vs lord to þi
                    blis. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Nisi granum frumenti cadens in terra / Intrauit Ihesu in quoddam
                        castellum (f. 224rb)
